title: List of birds of South Carolina
summary: This list of birds of South Carolina includes species documented in the U.S. state of South Carolina and accepted by the South Carolina Bird Records Committee (SCBRC) of the Carolina Bird Club. As of mid 2021, there were 437 species definitively included in the official list. Nine additional species are on the list but classed as Provisional I (see definitions below).[1] Of the 445 species on the primary list, 114 are rare anywhere in the state, 34 are rare away from the coast, five have been introduced to North America, and four are extinct. Fourteen additional species are classed as Provisional II and seven as Hypothetical as defined below.
